snippet.title: Pu-Li-Ru-La (Arcade Gears) [Saturn] by Taito [HD] [1080p]
snippet.description:
Pu-Li-Ru-La (プリルラ) is a 1991 arcade beat-'em-up by Taito. The game was later ported to the Sega Saturn as part of Xing's "Arcade Gears" collection.

Enjoy the video? Remember to like, comment, and subscribe!
Twitter: @SaturnMemories

Pu-Li-Ru-La, PuLiRuLa, Pu-Ri-Lu-Ra, PuRiLuRa (プリルラ, 프리루라, 普利盧拉街機版) | Arcade Gears (アーケードギアーズ) | T-26106G | Taito Corporation (タイトー, 타이토, 太东) | Xing Entertainment (エクシングエンタテイメント) | Sega Saturn (セガサターン, 세가 새턴, 世嘉土星) | [SS] | PlayStation (プレイステーション, 플레이스테이션, ) | [PS1], [PSX] | Arcade Game (アーケードゲーム, 아케이드 게임, 街机游戏) | Beat 'Em Up, Brawler (ベルトスクロールアクションゲーム, 진행형 격투 게임, 捲軸式格鬥遊戲) | Playthrough, Longplay | Gameplay | Walkthrough, Guide | Emulator (エミュレータ, 에뮬레이터, 游戏机模拟器) | SSF | High-definition (高精細, 고선명, 高解析) | HD | 1080p
